ygData.subject: DEX ???
ygData.msgSnippet: Why is dex our main attrib beside INT if we rarely go hand to hand? (I know we have a touch spell, but most people say that is more for shadowknights) I am mad
ygData.messageBody:
Why is dex our main attrib beside INT if we rarely go hand to hand?
(I know we have a touch spell, but most people say that is more for shadowknights)

I am mad I put my extra (after maxing int) points into dex now when I read a million posts now that say Dex is useless.

I mean from all I've read AGILITY is 100 times better for any caster!!!!

Please say it ain't so, and that my 100 dex (gnome) isn't a big frekin' waste . . .
